text: Petr Šidlík (born January 18, 1994) is a Czech professional ice hockey player. He is currently playing for Piráti Chomutov of the Czech Extraliga. Šidlík made his Czech Extraliga debut playing with HC Karlovy Vary during the 2014-15 Czech Extraliga season. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Piráti Chomutov players Category:HC Karlovy Vary players Category:Victoriaville Tigres players Category:Czech ice hockey defencemen Category:Sportspeople from Jihlava
title: Petr Šidlík
